statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 202 AND sale_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 100 AND customer_id = 500;

DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE available_quantity < 50 OR last_restock_date < '2021-05-01'

DELETE FROM Products WHERE product_name = 'Chair' AND category = 'Furniture';
